name: Groundhog Date
description:
Play in your browser

Help Roger the farmer harvest his carrots. He always need to keep an eye on the voracious groundhogs trying to eat his diner. When these little critters get together, things get out of hands!

CREDITS:

  • Hugo Bédard (Programming, AI, Level Design)
  • Jean-Samuel Aubry Guzzi (Programming, AI, Billboards, Voice Acting)
  • Marie-Eve Dubé (Programming, UI)
  • Claudia Boisvert (3D Art)
  • Ismael Serratos (Music)

3RD PARTY ASSETS:

  • Farmer Animation: Mixamo
  • Title Menu Font: PixelMush
